participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, with a passion for music and community service.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: energetic and adventurous, eager to experience new things and build independence.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work part-time at burger king.
